titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. David Sandifur, Judgment
CWG4749

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Ohio Circuit Court
October Term 1859-
Comth of Kentucky Plff
vs } Indictment for keeping Tippling House
David Sandifur Deft
This Defendent came into court and Confessed Judgment for $60.00. It is therefore adjudged that the Deft make his fine to the Comth by the payment of Sixty Dollars and the last of this prosecution
It is agreed by the atty for the Comth that no Execution shall issue on this Judgment for 12 months from date. Then Capias may issue &c

A. L. Morton Clk. O. C. C.
By W. H. Davidson D. C.

Comth of Kentucky
vs } Copy order
David Sandifur
